title: #39 - The Conscience Of A Killer - The Scariness of Lee Murray
description:
This week, we are up to our eyes in crime, mayhem, and overall craziness. Our subject was a fighter, in every way possible. From the UFC, to being stabbed in bar brawls. He was a troubled kid, turned major underworld figure, with a record that ranges from simple loitering, to extreme violence, to masterminding the largest crime of its kind, in the history of the world. A character, a lunatic, and generally one of the most dangerous people that we've ever encountered in the Crime In Sports world. Buckle up, because this one is jam packed!Hop out of the octagon, gather up your heist crew, and beat up 9 people at time with "Lightning" Lee Murray!! Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!

Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman


 

New episodes every Tuesday!!

Please subscribe, rate, and review!

Listen on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, or wherever you listen to podcasts!

Head to shutupandgivememurder.com for all things Crime in Sports!

For merchandise: crimeinsports.threadless.com

Check out James and Jimmie's other show: Small Town Murder

 

Follow us on social media!

Facebook: facebook.com/crimeinsports

Instagram: instagram.com/smalltownmurder

Twitter: twitter.com/MurderSmall

 

Contact the show: crimeinsports@gmail.com

Donate on Patreon: patreon.com/crimeinsports

PayPal: paypal.me/crimeinsports

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
